installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# DoritoBot Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y git mariadb-client

echo -e "Updating npm. Please wait..."
npm install npm@latest --location=global

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

git clone https://github.com/itzMiney/DoritoBot.git .

echo "Installing Node.js packages..."
if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then
  /usr/local/bin/npm ci 
else
  /usr/local/bin/npm install
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/db_migrations/initial-schema.sql ]; then
  echo "Testing database connection..."
  if ! /usr/bin/mariadb -h "${DB_HOST}" -u "${DB_USER}" -p"${DB_PASSWORD}" -e "USE ${DB_NAME};" &>/dev/null; then
    echo "Error: Unable to connect to the database. Check your credentials."
    exit 1
  fi

  echo "Importing initial schema..."
  /usr/bin/mariadb -h "${DB_HOST}" -u "${DB_USER}" -p"${DB_PASSWORD}" "${DB_NAME}" < /mnt/server/db_migrations/initial-schema.sql
else
  echo "Error: initial-schema.sql not found."
  exit 1
fi

echo -e "Installation complete"
exit 0
